metadata.title: CVE-2016-3612 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Unspecified vulnerability in the Oracle VM VirtualBox component in OracleVirtualization VirtualBox before 5.0.22 allows remote attackers to affectconfidentiality via vectors related to Core.

criterions.comment: virtualbox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
